entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Scroll to new view without tabs #15171
  • MAUI ios will no longer build on windows when using Xamarin.Firebase.iOS.CloudMessaging #15170
  • Using ".." in route definition doesn't remove last navigated page(s) from nav stack #15166
  • iOS - Basic collection view elements don't render properly. #15164
  • Grid and ScrollView don't play well together [iOS, Regression] #15163
  • Border StrokeThickness="0" not working when parent is Grid #15162
  • The foreground stop running when application is not in foreground #15161
  • [iOS] MAUI ScrollView is not scrollable when Keyboard hides content #15159
  • Android EmptyView in CollectionView weird resizine after screen rotation #15158
  • Windows Cannot click on EmptyView #15157
  • Flyout title has different MaxLine count on different platforms #15156
  • Windows Flyout Title has maxLines 2 when app is not in full screen and only one when app is in full screen #15155
  • iOS Flyout title is not broken over multiple lines when you rotate your screen #15154
  • iOS - Can't scroll to the last item in Flyout #15153
  • Windows EmptyView different vertical/horizontal options when Template/View used #15152
  • PathF.Bounds returns too big boxes #15151
  • Picker is empty #15150
  • MauiHybrid <datalist> element no longer working #15149
  • CollectionView in VerticalStackLayout different behavior on different platforms #15148
  • Using DataTemplate breaks ObservableCollection binding #15147
  • Defining built-in visual states throws exception #15146

Closed

  • [iOS] CollectionView takes up huge vertical space #9135
    .NET 8 Planning
  • RightToLeft does not work when StackLayout has a child with EndAndExpand #8488
  • ListView in MacCatalyst is slow and render incorrectly when scroll back / up #11287
    Backlog
  • CollectionView's VerticalOptions are not working as intended on iOS. #14966
    Backlog
  • Filepicker doesn't work in sandbox mode (MacCatalyst) #15129
    Backlog
  • Shell Flyout Issue (App ThemeBinding wont update icon) #8334
    Backlog
  • Maui Android OnBackPressed has wrong return type #7567
  • Views always returning -1 as Width #15046
  • [Windows] How to completely hide the TitleBar? #15142
  • Incorrect image orientation using MediaPicker CapturePhoto on iOS #9535
    Backlog
  • [regression/7.0.86] On iOS grid rows that are set to star display as auto when view is added later that spans all rows and columns #15079
    .NET 7 + Servicing

PullRequests

Created

  • Small fixes for uitest project location and install #15172
  • Default ANDROID_SDK_ROOT if not set #15169
  • Use Frame command to recalc span bounds #15168

Merged

  • Make CollectionView on iOS measure to content size #14951
    area/collectionview 📃, backport/suggested
  • Remove incorrect call to `DisconnectHandler` #15036
  • [workload] add metadata about .NET 6 EOL #15117
    area/setup 🪄
  • [Android] Don't dispose connectivity listeners #15145
  • Wait for root page to load before processing modal #15037
  • Adjust index path for cell reuseid in carouselview #15140
  • [iOS] Normalize the orientation from MediaPicker photos #14568
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/essentials 🍞

Updated

  • Don't retain parameters not passed as query string parameters #14965
    t/breaking 💥, p/1, area/shell 🐢, partner/cat 😻, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Android gallery fixes #15118
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Windows/macOS] Implement menu key accelerators #14740
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, control-menubar
  • Fix contentview rtl #15114
    area/layout 🔲
  • Update mappers instead of replacing field values #13836
    t/breaking 💥, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Use Platform* Graphics APIs to match with the rest of the platforms #12818
    t/breaking 💥, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Account for padding when expanding * rows/columns to new sizes #15143
    area/layout 🔲
  • [Android] Fix NullReferenceException on WebAuthenticatorIntermediateActivity #15052
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Fix: Binding doesn't respect special IValueConverter return values #12060
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • Move some controls to use ModifyMapping #15058
  • Update CODEOWNERS #15008
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, community ✨, partner/tizen
